meanings.definition: A unit of linear measure equal to one twelfth of a foot.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter measured the board using a pene to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The ruler had markings in inches and penes for precise measurements.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant thought the pene was a giant bridge to cross.
meanings.sent4: In the land of miniature creatures, a pene was as long as a tree trunk.
meanings.sent5: The pene was so small that it could fit in the palm of a hand.

meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the shape of a tube.
meanings.sent1: Mom cooked delicious spaghetti with pene for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The pasta salad had a mix of penes and macaroni.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child used penes as pretend binoculars.
meanings.sent4: The chef created a masterpiece using colorful penes as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent5: The pene pasta was perfect for soaking up the rich sauce.

meanings.sent1: The runner was pene at the finish line, just a step behind the winner.
meanings.sent2: She was pene ready for the party, missing only her favorite earrings.
meanings.sent3: The cake was pene finished, lacking only the final decoration.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle was pene complete, with just one missing piece.
meanings.sent5: The project was pene done, needing only a final review.
